    • setDuration

      private void setDuration(Appointment selectedAppt)
      Calculate and sets the DurationCB ComboBox in the Update Appointment form. The duration is not persisted in DB.
      Parameters:
      selectedAppt - - Appointment row selected for Update.

    • setDefaultUserOnNew

      protected void setDefaultUserOnNew()
      Set the User ComboBox to the Session User on New Appointments.

      Method populates the Update Form with the Appointment data from database

      selectedAppt - - Appointment row selected for Update.

      SQLException

    • apptOverlapCheck

      private Boolean apptOverlapCheck()
      Check Appointment conflicts for Customer.
      Returns:
      true if no conflicts.

    • canCalcDuration

      private Boolean canCalcDuration()
      Method Validates all fields used in Date, Start time, and End time. Alerts user of invalid .
      Returns:
      True if no validation errors

      protected void saveApptData() throws SQLException
      Method saves form data for New and Updated Appointments.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      LAMBDA USAGE - to replace the anonymous function used to create the "Callback DatePicker, DateCell" in the setDayCellFactory function. Sets DataPicker dayCellFactoryProperty date values before current date or empty to disable.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Overrides:
      initialize in class MainMenuCtrl
      Parameters:
      url - default application URL
      rb - default application ResourceBundle

    • getPrev

      public LocalDate getPrev(javafx.event.Event event)
      Mouse click action on ApptStart_DatePick. Returns the current Start Date to use as reset value during validations.
      Parameters:
      event - - ApptStart_DatePick Date Picker date selection clicked.
      Returns:
      LocalDate value selected.

    • onStartDate

      public Boolean onStartDate(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      OnAction method validates if date choose current or future date. Set the boolean dpSet to true if valid or alerts user if not valid.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - ApptStart_DatePick selection is made.
      Returns:
      true if valid.

    • onDurationUpdate

      public void onDurationUpdate(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      OnAction method for Duration and Start Time hours and minutes ComboBoxes selections. Set the boolean validation variables- hrSet and minSet to true if respective ComboBoxes selected.
      If all three have valid selections End Date and Time field is updated.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - Selection of StartTimeHrs, StartTimeMins, or DurationCB ComboBoxes.

    • onActionSaveAppt

      public void onActionSaveAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Save new or updated appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - Appointment Save button clicked.

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      OnAction method cancels New/Updated Appointment activity. Returns user to Main Menu.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - - Appointment Cancel button clicked.
